metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5632 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In Eclipse Mosquito before and including 2.0.5, establishing a connectionto the mosquitto server without sending data causes the EPOLLOUT event tobe added, which results excessive CPU consumption. This could be used by amalicious actor to perform denial of service type attack. This issue isfixed in 2.0.6

criterions.comment: mosquitto: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
